channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util)

item.title: CVE-2022-25147|2024-08-03T04:29:01.897Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20portable%20runtime%20utility%20%28apr-util%29
item.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_base64 functions of Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) allows an attacker to write beyond bounds of a buffer.
This issue affects Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) 1.6.1 and prior versions.
